casebody.data:
STATE OF MONTANA, Plaintiff, vs. DENNIS LEE MARKS, Defendant.

DECISION

No. 2761-A DATED this 13th day of May, 1977.

The application of the above-named defendant for a review of the sentence of Ten years imposed on October 25, 1976, was fully heard and after a careful consideration of the entire matter it is decided that:

The sentence be and remain as originally imposed.

We wish to thank James Johnstone, of the Montana Defender Project, for his assistance to the defendant and to this Court.

SENTENCE REVIEW DIVISION

Jack L. Green, Chairman; Robert C. Sykes.
